title: 2.5oz Small Portable Gift Aromatherapy Candle,Soy Wax Tin Candles,Set of 16 Scented Candles Gift for Mother, Wife, Daughter, Friend
descriptions:
**Title:**
2.5oz Small Portable Gift Aromatherapy Candle, Soy Wax Tin Candles, Set of 16 Scented Candles Gift for Mother, Wife, Daughter, Friend

**Description:**
Dive into the enchanting world of aromatherapy with our exquisite 2.5oz Small Portable Gift Aromatherapy Candles. These delightful soy wax tin candles are the perfect way to transport the essence of nature into any home or office. With a charming set of 16 scented candles, infused with natural essential oils, they are sure to bring a touch of luxury and relaxation to your daily life.

**Why Choose Our Candles?**

- **16 Magical Scents to Choose From:**
  - Jasmine: Invigorating and soothing
  - Rose: Romantic and gentle
  - Vanilla: Warm and comforting
  - Bergamot: Uplifting and energizing
  - Fig: Earthy and luxurious
  - Lavender: Calming and restful
  - Lemon: Fresh and zesty
  - Spring: Inviting and floral
  - Gardenia: Elegant and sweet
  - Strawberry: Sweet and inviting
  - Rosemary: Refreshing and invigorating
  - Peppermint: Cool and invigorating
  - Bluebell: Mysterious and enchanting
  - Wood Sage & Sea Salt: Inviting and earthy
  - Peony Cherry Blossom: Romantic and delicate
  - English Pear & Freesia: Refreshing and sweet

- **Natural Soy Wax Quality:**
  - Our candles are made from natural soy wax, ensuring a clean burn and a rich, long-lasting scent throw. Each candle provides approximately 18-20 hours of burning time, making them a perfect gift for any occasion.

- **Tin Cans for Portability and Recyclability:**
  - Our candles come in sleek, portable tin cans that are not only easy to carry around but also reusable. Whether you're looking to use them as flowerpots or for home decor, these cans can serve multiple purposes!

- **Safety and Convenience:**
  - Keep these candles out of reach of children and pets when unattended to ensure a safe and enjoyable experience. The durable tin cans make these candles a safe and convenient gift for Mother, Wife, Daughter, or any friend in your life.

**Perfect Gift Ideas:**
- **For the Mother:** Show her how much you appreciate her with a set of these calming scented candles.
- **For the Wife:** Surprise her with a set of these romantic scents to add a touch of luxury to her nights.
- **For the Daughter:** Give her a set of these delightful scents to help her unwind and relax.
- **For the Friend:** Share the joy of these scented candles and bring a smile to their face.

Make every moment special with our 2.5oz Small Portable Gift Aromatherapy Candles. Order now and bring a touch of nature into your life!
